Content.En: Haha! Have you ever been to a biology laboratory?
Content.Cn: 笑死我了！你去过生物实验室了吗！

Content.En: Someone arranged the skeleton specimens in the biology laboratory to look like a crime scene!
Content.Cn: 有人把生物实验室的骷髅标本，布置成了案发现场的样子！

Content.En: A skeleton specimen lying on the ground, with a wig placed on its head!
Content.Cn: 倒在地上的骷髅标本，脑袋上还套了个假发！

Content.En: Quite hilarious! They even placed body outline markers around the skeleton and used ketchup as bloodstains...
Content.Cn: 太好笑了！还在骷髅周围贴了尸体标记带以及用番茄酱当血迹…

Content.En: The class teacher was so angry that his face was contorted. I passed by the office just now and saw him scolding loudly!
Content.Cn: 班主任气的脸都歪了。刚才我路过办公室，看到他正在骂呢哈哈！

Content.En: As the all-knowing one, you must know who did it, right?
Content.Cn: 大、大大万事通，你一定知道是谁搞得对吧？

Content.En: If you know, you must tell me!
Content.Cn: 如果知道了，一定要告诉我啊！

Content.En: I truly admire him so much!
